dashboard.welcomeSts: Welcome to our dashboard! On this page, you will be able to view all the online pages, edit each one of them and even add new ones!

modal.title: Page details
modal.description: Here you can edit your page details and edit the text resources of that page.

trModal.descriptionAll: Here you can view and edit all the text resources of the page and add new ones
trModal.descriptionEdit: Update the values you want and click on the save changes button
trModal.descriptionAdd: Fill the values and click on the add button
